func:
const info = msg.payload.feeds[0]
const {created_at, entry_id, ...fields} = info

var currentUids = msg.payload.feeds[0].field4
currentUids = currentUids.split(",")
currentUids = currentUids.filter(item => item !== flow.get('selectedUid'))

msg.payload = { 
    "api_key": "8MQ6OOBCODPX2I0Z",
    ...fields,
    "field4": currentUids.join(',')
}

return msg;

name: check if all fields null
func:
if(msg.payload.timesIncorrect == null &&
    msg.payload.lockTime == null &&
    msg.payload.soundTime == null)
    msg.payload = null
return msg;
